title: Installation issue: wrf (on CentOS 7)
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install wrf@4.2 ^openmpi@4.0.2%gcc@10.2.0~atomics~cuda+cxx+cxx_exceptions+gpfs~java+legacylaunchers+lustre+memchecker+pmi~singularity~sqlite3+static~thread_multiple+vt+wrapper-rpath fabrics=auto schedulers=slurm
...
==> Error: InstallError: Compile failed. Check the output log for details.

/apps/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/wrf/package.py:325, in build:
        322
        323        if not result:
        324            raise InstallError(
  >>    325                "Compile failed. Check the output log for details."
        326            )

See build log for details:
  /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-wrf-4.2-z7zpvw7dz434c5grxacyvry54efraafe/spack-build-out.txt
```

### Information on your system
```
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.0-193-3f5f809
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-broadwell
* **Concretizer:** original
```

compilers.yaml and packages.yaml are included here in [compilers_packages_yaml.zip](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5666842/compilers_packages_yaml.zip)


### Additional information
[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5666852/spack-build-env.txt)
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5666853/spack-build-out.txt)

Although the error message from building indicates `Compile failed. Check the output log for details.` the stderr and stdout from executing `./compile` is lost when spack exits. This happens in because stdout and stderr are stored in `result_buf`
```
298         result_buf = csh(
299             "./compile",
300             "-j",
301             num_jobs,
302             self.spec.variants["compile_type"].value,
303             output=str,
304             error=str
305         )
```
I forced a print of `result_buf` by editing the wrf package file, and I'm finding a number of undefined reference errors
```
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: libwrflib.a(output_wrf.o): in function `output_wrf_':
output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x4bcb): undefined reference to `nl_get_fgdt_'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x4bda): undefined reference to `nl_get_guv_'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x4be9): undefined reference to `nl_get_gt_'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x4bf8): undefined reference to `nl_get_gq_'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x4c09): undefined reference to `nl_get_if_ramping_'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x4c1a): undefined reference to `nl_get_dtramp_min_'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x4c33): undefined reference to `nl_get_fdda_end_'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x4c42): undefined reference to `nl_get_obs_nudge_wind_'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x4c51): undefined reference to `nl_get_obs_coef_wind_'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x4c60): undefined reference to `nl_get_obs_nudge_temp_'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x4c6f): undefined reference to `nl_get_obs_coef_temp_'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x4c7e): undefined reference to `nl_get_obs_nudge_mois_'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x4c8d): undefined reference to `nl_get_obs_coef_mois_'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x4c9c): undefined reference to `nl_get_obs_nudge_pstr_'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x4cab): undefined reference to `nl_get_obs_coef_pstr_'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x4cbc): undefined reference to `nl_get_obs_ionf_'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x4ccd): undefined reference to `nl_get_obs_idynin_'

/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x4dc3): undefined reference to `nl_get_adjust_output_times_'

/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x4ebe): undefined reference to `__module_io_MOD_wrf_put_dom_ti_real_sca'

/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x5506): undefined reference to `__module_io_MOD_wrf_put_dom_ti_integer_sca'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x5528): undefined reference to `__module_io_MOD_wrf_put_dom_ti_integer_sca'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x554a): undefined reference to `__module_io_MOD_wrf_put_dom_ti_integer_sca'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x5576): undefined reference to `__module_io_MOD_wrf_put_dom_ti_real_sca'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x5598): undefined reference to `__module_io_MOD_wrf_put_dom_ti_real_sca'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x55ba): undefined reference to `__module_io_MOD_wrf_put_dom_ti_real_sca'

/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x5642): undefined reference to `__module_io_MOD_wrf_put_dom_ti_integer_sca'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x566e): undefined reference to `__module_io_MOD_wrf_put_dom_ti_real_sca'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x5690): undefined reference to `__module_io_MOD_wrf_put_dom_ti_real_sca'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x56b2): undefined reference to `__module_io_MOD_wrf_put_dom_ti_real_sca'
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x56d4): undefined reference to `__module_io_MOD_wrf_put_dom_ti_real_sca'

/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: libwrflib.a(output_wrf.o):output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x5718): more undefined references to `__module_io_MOD_wrf_put_dom_ti_real_sca' follow
/opt/rh/devtoolset-9/root/usr/bin/ld: libwrflib.a(output_wrf.o): in function `output_wrf_':
output_wrf.f90:(.text+0x573a): undefined reference to `__module_io_MOD_wrf_put_dom_ti_integer_sca'
```

@MichaelLaufer  @ptooley 

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [ X ] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [ X ] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ X ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [ X ] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
